title: Early Birds Get the Profits: Investors Flock to Fezoo (FEZ) Anticipating High Returns Amid Ethereum (ETH) and Bitcoin (BTC) Corrections
description: Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) are without a doubt the most prominent names in crypto. The last month has seen them both surge in price in what has been the peak of the current bull run with Ethereum (ETH) rising above $4K for the first time in years.

title: Cardano (ADA) Encounters a Dip, But Shows Promising Year-On-Year Growth
description: Cardano (ADA) has witnessed a fluctuation in its market performance as of late, with a notable 5.2% decrease in the last 24 hours bringing its current price down to $0.71. Despite this short-term setback, ADA boasts an impressive 123.1% increase year on year, alongside a trading volume reaching $1.481 billion.

title: Why Smart Money is Betting on Fezoo (FEZ) Early: Advanced Security Protocols Attracting Ethereum (ETH) and Solana (SOL) holders
description: Ethereum (ETH) and Solana (SOL) have told a similar story for much of this year. In particular, they have both risen impressively in the last month. They are some of the biggest beneficiaries of the bull run.

title: Move Over XRP: Discover the Crypto That's Racing to $1 and Then Zooming to $10!
description: Explore the latest developments in the crypto world as we take a closer look at the new digital asset that's threatening to overtake XRP. Learn about its potential to hit $1 and skyrocket to $10!

title: Quantum Leap in Streaming: Shiba Inu (SHIB) and USD Coin (USDC) Investors Flock to DeeStream (DST) for Unmatched Opportunities
description: The crypto market has entered a corrective phase following Bitcoin's historic all-time high above $73k. Shiba Inu (SHIB), which was among the highest performing cryptocurrencies in the top 100, has dropped significantly in the past week.

title: El Salvador President Says Country Moving Bitcoin Into Cold Storage Amid Daily One BTC Investment Plan
description:
The President of El Salvador says that the country is now moving its Bitcoin (BTC) stash into cold storage. In a new thread on the social media platform X, President Nayib Bukele says El Salvador will create a Bitcoin “piggy bank” and continue to implement its plan of accumulating one BTC per day. “We’ve decided to […]

The post El Salvador President Says Country Moving Bitcoin Into Cold Storage Amid Daily One BTC Investment Plan appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
